meanings.sent1: The vitesse of the car was impressive as it zoomed down the road.
meanings.sent2: The vitesse of the cheetah allowed it to outrun its prey easily.
meanings.sent3: The snail challenged the hare to a race to test its vitesse.
meanings.sent4: His vitesse on the soccer field was like lightning, leaving opponents in awe.
meanings.sent5: The vitesse of the roller coaster made the ride thrilling and exhilarating.

meanings.sent1: The athlete's vitesse in the sprint was unmatched by any competitor.
meanings.sent2: The vitesse of the river's current carried the boat downstream rapidly.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's vitesse in gathering nuts was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to slow down as the cheetah displayed its vitesse in the chase.
meanings.sent5: The vitesse of the wind during the storm was so strong, it uprooted trees.
